name: Oracle
description: The Chainlink Oracle contract. Node operators can deploy this contract to fulfill requests sent to them.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOracleRequest
functionDecorators.description: Allows requesters to cancel requests sent to this oracle contract. Will transfer the LINK sent for the request back to the requester's address. Given params must hash to a commitment stored on the contract in order for the request to be valid Emits CancelOracleRequest event.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The request ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of payment given (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackFunc
parameterDecorators.description: The requester's specified callback address.

parameterDecorators.name: _expiration
parameterDecorators.description: The time of the expiration for the request.

functionDecorators.name: fulfillOracleRequest
functionDecorators.description: Called by the Chainlink node to fulfill requests. Given params must hash back to the commitment stored from `oracleRequest`. Will call the callback address' callback function without bubbling up error checking in a `require` so that the node can get paid.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The fulfillment request ID that must match the requester's.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: The payment amount that will be released for the oracle (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The callback address to call for fulfillment.

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackFunctionId
parameterDecorators.description: The callback function ID to use for fulfillment.

parameterDecorators.name: _expiration
parameterDecorators.description: The expiration that the node should respond by before the requester can cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The data to return to the consuming contract.

returnDecorators.description: Status if the external call was successful.

functionDecorators.name: getAuthorizationStatus
functionDecorators.description: Use this to check if a node is authorized for fulfilling requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _node
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the Chainlink node.

returnDecorators.description: The authorization status of the node.

functionDecorators.name: getChainlinkToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the LINK token. This is the public implementation for chainlinkTokenAddress, which is an internal method of the ChainlinkClient contract.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: onTokenTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Called when LINK is sent to the contract via `transferAndCall`. The data payload's first 2 words will be overwritten by the `_sender` and `_amount` values to ensure correctness. Calls oracleRequest.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of LINK sent (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Payload of the transaction.

functionDecorators.name: oracleRequest
functionDecorators.description: Creates the Chainlink request. Stores the hash of the params as the on-chain commitment for the request. Emits OracleRequest event for the Chainlink node to detect.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: The sender of the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of payment given (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: _specId
parameterDecorators.description: The Job Specification ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The callback address for the response.

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackFunctionId
parameterDecorators.description: The callback function ID for the response.

parameterDecorators.name: _nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The nonce sent by the requester.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataVersion
parameterDecorators.description: The specified data version.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The CBOR payload of the request.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFulfillmentPermission
functionDecorators.description: Sets the fulfillment permission for a given node. Use `true` to allow, `false` to disallow.

parameterDecorators.name: _node
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the Chainlink node.

parameterDecorators.name: _allowed
parameterDecorators.description: Bool value to determine if the node can fulfill requests.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Allows the node operator to withdraw earned LINK to a given address. The owner of the contract can be another wallet and does not have to be a Chainlink node.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send the LINK token to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to send (specified in wei).

functionDecorators.name: withdrawable
functionDecorators.description: Displays the amount of LINK that is available for the node operator to withdraw. We use `ONE_FOR_CONSISTENT_GAS_COST` in place of 0 in storage.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of withdrawable LINK on the contract.
